title: Niko: boy of Greece
brief_description: Filmed on the small Greek island of Mykonos. Deals with the daily life of a 10-year-old as he learns the crafts and traditions of the community. Shows fishing, sheep herding, baking, shopping and school activities. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
